dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

MIME element (text/plain) 
My name is Chris Manoly and you are hosting a site by the name of " 
TheStraights.com". This website contains an article which gives personal

information myself when I was a minor.  This article/site containing
this 
information needs to be removed immediately, there was not consent given
to 
post this information. Please do so immediately to avoid legal action.
This 
information has interfered with my career and am prepared to collect for

damages if necessary. Thank you for your help and please respond ASAP. 
 
MIME element (text/html) 
My name is Chris Manoly and you are hosting a site by the name of
"TheStraights.com". This website contains an article which
gives personal information myself when I was a minor.  This
article/site containing this information needs to be removed
immediately, there was not consent given to post this information.
Please do so immediately to avoid legal action. This information has
interfered with my career and am prepared to collect for damages if
necessary. Thank you for your help and please respond ASAP.
